alfredsnippet.snippet:
Barber, T. X., Pitfalls In Human Research - Ten Pivotal Points, Pergamon Press, Inc, 1976, p.6

"Scientist at times fail to 'see' events that are incongruent with the assumptions of a prevailing paradigm."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Scientist's Failure to See Incongruent Events
